critique: This executive order pertains to a very specific and limited change regarding allowances for quarters and subsistence for enlisted men, specifically updating a list of exceptions to include Naval Missions to Brazil and Peru. It is difficult to assess broad political biases based on such a narrow administrative adjustment. There is no clear indication of ideological tilt, immigration stance, expansion of executive power, federalism implications, security vs. liberty concerns, economic regulation, or social inclusion. Therefore, most scores will be neutral.
